### ST CENTROID AGG
Calculate the spatial centroid over a field with spatial geometry type.
Supports `geo_point` and `cartesian_point`, as well as `geo_shape` and `cartesian_shape`.

```esql
FROM airports
| STATS centroid=ST_CENTROID_AGG(location)
```
